data.name: Cull Obsidian
data.description: Cull Obsidian is a Protector who guards the Black Order and retaliates against those who would defy Thanos.

starItems.name: Cull Obsidian
starItems.description: Cull Obsidian is a Protector who guards the Black Order and retaliates against those who would defy Thanos.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

1.nextUpgrade: Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. If a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> is an ally, clear all negative effects instead

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. If a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> is an ally, clear all negative effects instead.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. If a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> is an ally, clear all negative effects instead.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. If a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> is an ally, clear all negative effects instead.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. If a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> is an ally, clear all negative effects instead.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. If a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> is an ally, clear all negative effects instead.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. If a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> is an ally, clear all negative effects instead.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on self

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on self.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on self.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer all positive effects on primary target to self

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on self.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer all positive effects on primary target to self.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
Always transfer all positive effects on primary target to self

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>440%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on self.

Transfer all positive effects on primary target to self.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>110%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on self

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>550%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>25%</color> additional damage per <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on self.

Transfer all positive effects on primary target to self.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. This character can only do this once per match.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or Thanos ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color>, or <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or Thanos ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color>, or <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or Thanos ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color>, or <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage
While this character has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance.

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or Thanos ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color>, or <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade: The first time any character takes a turn while this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>30%</color> and this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, heal for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
On ally Thanos Turn, if he doesn't have the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color>, grant him the <color=#c05fd0>Power Stone</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>LEGENDARY</color> <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> or Thanos ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color>, or <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

The first time any character takes a turn while this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>30%</color> and this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, heal for <color=#86e619>40%</color> of this character's Max Health.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>BLACK ORDER</color> and Thanos allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
